title: #FutureFit Yourself: The power of podcasting in the 21st century
introText: Steve Jobs was unyielding in his view that podcasts were the future. Read this #FutureFit article on BizCommunity.
bodyHtml:
Carmen Murray wrote an interesting article on podcasting for BizCommunity about how podcasting is part of being #FutureFit.

You can learn more about being Future Fit with Podcasts on BizCommunity.
